WorkItem.ClosedComment: Thanks for reporting this! The issue has been fixed and can be tried out in the upcoming 0.9.5 release. We also have a beta available (https://typescript.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=TypeScript%200.9.5%20beta) if you'd like to try it out.
WorkItem.Description:
* open this link: http://www.typescriptlang.org/Playground/#src=%0A%0Afunction%20f()%20%7B%0A%09var%20array%20%3D%20%5B%5D%3B%0A%09for%20(var%20i%20%3D%200%3B%20i%20%3C%20array.length%3B%20i%2B%2B)%20%7B%0A%09%09var%20element%20%3D%20array%5Bi%5D%3B%0A%09%09%0A%09%7D%0A%09%0A%09for%20(var%20i%20%3D%200%3B%20i%20%3C%20array.length%3B%20i%2B%2B)%20%7B%0A%09%09var%20element%20%3D%20array%5Bi%5D%3B%0A%09%09%0A%09%7D%0A%7D
* select the variable ```i```
-> see that one occurrence isn't highlighted (the redeclaration of ```i```)
WorkItem.Summary: Variable highlights don't include re-declared variabled
